Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.name: buttonFont
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.abstract: This allows you to set the font of the button. This is not inspectable, and must be set programmatically.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: gradientEndColor
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: The ending color. If not provided, then the starting color is used.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: gradientAngleInDegrees
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: The angle of the gradient, in degrees. 0 (default) is top-to-bottom.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: reversed
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: If true, then the label is reversed, so the background is “cut out” of the foreground.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: borderWidthInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: This allows access to the border width.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.name: forceRedraw()
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.abstract: This is used to flush the caches, and redraw the button.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: We call this, when it’s time to lay out the control.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: continueTracking(_:with:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called while tracking user touch. We use this to play with the alpha, while tracking.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: endTracking(_:with:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when ending user touch. We use this to restore the alpha.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: setTitle(_:for:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when setting text. We use this, to ensure we redraw the mask.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: setImage(_:for:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when setting images. We use this, to ensure we redraw the mask.
